General The center needs to have an android phone/ laptop/ tab / PC to access all the resources provided by the company. The center will be informed about the service request received by the YaDude app, if an android phone is available, or by text SMS. For each customer directed by YaDude to the center, it is obliged by contract to pay 10% of the amount paid by the customer, for any particular service, as the customer fee to YaDude. The Center owners have the full right to decide the working hours of their Center and their staff. For the pick and drop services the center must provide a professional driver and he should have a valid company ID card. The owner of the garage has the right to choose the type of services they want to provide and the respective prices they want to charge for the same. Number of customers will depend on the customer satisfaction and the ratings of the center on the online platform. Customer will only be provided if the Center falls in the proximity of the customer and they choose this particular service provider. YaDude is an online aggregator platform and does not guarantee for any amount of business. Spare parts will be suggested and provided according to the customer’s demand. Company will provide some percentage of margin on the Spare Parts (recommended by the company) sold to the customer by the service provider. The salary of the staff, mechanics and other workers will be decided by the center owners. Company will provide offers to the centers like funding for expansion of garage, better tools, training for new vehicles etc. and these will depend entirely of the performance of the service center and their ratings.
SERVICE CENTER MEMBERSHIP (Portal access fee) Service Center (referred to hereafter as "Center") membership includes listing of Center on YaDude, listing of center on Google My Business, integration of center with the YaDude platform, access to payment gateways, access to Management tools, like billing, inventory management, and access to the online resources, like Training videos, Blogs, Workshops, etc. For availing the membership the center has to pay a non-refundable membership fee of Rs 150 to YaDude and forcing/pushing company or individual (by wrong way of pressure/force) for refund is considered to be illegal and a legal action against the accused will be taken by the company.
Dealer Ranking and Reviews To make system transparent for customers/ visitors, YaDude ranks dealers/service centers /repair shops based on formula which is based on many variables like Customer satisfaction, response time, availability, location, etc. The dealer who has more customer satisfaction, quick response time and better location will get higher rank than others. Formula for ranking may change as we get more analysis to provide customer more transparency. There is no guarantee for accuracy of the ranking but YaDude would help customers to meet the best with transparent system.
Motor Vehicle Care Tips and Articles The information contained in car care articles, tips, do-it-yourself guide, is for knowledge and educational purposes only and cannot substitute the advice of a professional. Please dont attempt to service a car if you dont have proper knowledge and tools based on that information until verified by a professional, you can harm yourself or damage the vehicle beyond repair. So consulting a professional before implementing the method or information is advised.
